Adopt A Pichu

WELCOME TO PICHU ADOPTION CENTER!!!
These are the pichu's you can take home , On one condition , You have to link back to my main page and take good care of your pichu or pichu's. Or if you don't have a webpage I'll put your pichu in our nursery... If you don't know how to use html codes and you have a webpage you just e-mail me at sierra_vulpix@yahoo.com Identify the pichu you want and what you want to name it and I'll send it to you, html and all. Or put it up in the nursery if you dont have a webpage as soon as possible.
Here they are!!!
